column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I ordered a Caesar salad
column2: the soup of the day - which was French onion
column3: and a lemonade. This totaled out to be almost $20
column4: which is pretty much not worth it. The salad was pretty good
column5: but it comes a special topping. The French onion soup was OK
column6: but the portion should have been way larger than what it was. The lemonade is nothing special.
